property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have total power 7000 or less and destroy them. {HYPERIFY} Tap one of your other creatures. (During your main step, you may unleash Hyper Mode. Hyper Mode stays until the start of your next turn.) ---- {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it untaps, choose one of your creatures. It gets +4000 power and "powered breaker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack unless you have 5 or more cards in your graveyard. {HYPERIFY} Tap one of your other creatures. (During your main step, you may unleash Hyper Mode. Hyper Mode stays until the start of your next turn.) ---- ■ At the end of your turn, you may put a card from the top of your deck into your graveyard for each of your tapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, unleash one of your Hyper Beast's Hyper Mode until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose another card in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and shieldify it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, draw a card, then put a card from your hand into your mana zone. ■ Each turn, the first time you put a multicolored card in your mana zone, untap that card.

card.name: K Atlan and King Pirates Crew / Aye Aye Sir Charger

property.name: Name1
property.value: K Atlan and King Pirates Crew

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the start of each turn, untap this creature. TWINPACT ■ Return a spell from your graveyard to your hand. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)
